modShortDescription: Removed the open/close times from traders so they always remain open.
modDescription:
Removed the open/close times from [traders](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-trader/) so they always remain open.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/KhaineGB/KhaineA20ModletsXML/tree/main/KHA20-AlwaysOpenTrader)** for A20
